Summary: Noticed bright star at approx 9:20 EST, no sound, no blink followed by another.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Gladstone
There were no other sightings in Gladstone on or around September 9th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out on back deck around 9:20 pm EST to relieve myself while letting dog out. Was attracted to turn head to left and up by (?) to see bright star (as bright as Venus) like object that was traveling west to east with no sound or blinking lights but very light tail - wife also observed as I called her out to observe. We watched it take a straight course East and disappear near tree level. Appeared high and traveling fast. I then looked back and there was another (tree line to 180) on same course. This one however appeared to veer slightly but stayed on course to again fade away at tree line. Lighting was steady and star like with no other colors presented. Nothing further noticed so suspecting space station and shuttle if in area. No pictures taken or others contacted.
